0.user_question: A pet shelter had 5 puppies when another 35 were brought in. If 8 puppies a day are adopted, how long would it take for all of them to be adopted?

ost_step.1: Determine the total number of puppies at the shelter by adding the original number of puppies to the number of new ones that arrived. There were originally 5 puppies, and 35 more were added. So, there are 5 + 35 = 40 puppies.
ost_step.2: Since 8 puppies are adopted per day, divide the total number of puppies by the daily adoption rate to determine how many days it will take to adopt all of them. This can be calculated as 40 / 8 = 5.
